page.title: 13A day at Primary School
page.content:
Karen Robson Wed 19 June l985
At 8 am in the morning I got up and at 8:15 I had my breakfast. After breakfast I cleaned my face and teeth. At five to nine I started up to school. We had a few minutes play then I went into school and the register was taken. Then the infants came and we had Assembly. After that we had arithmetic. Then we saw the coach coming to take us swimming at Shefford Lower School. Before that I had a few minutes play then I came back to collect my swimming bag. We got on the coach and went swimming. At midday we had lunch and I stayed for a packed sandwich meal. For lunch I had an apple, sandwiches and some crackerbreads. After lunch we had an hour and a quarter play in that time we played tag and a shape game.
